text: Hello everyone, we would like to create a stand alone landing page to upload to the market place. I'm working with themes, actually with three themes at this moment. But I'm trying to find out how can I create one stand alone landing page this way and I'm not finding info for that, should I create a theme and upload only that section to the marketplace? Is there a way to just have one stylesheet and page for it? How does it work?

Themes are required to have a website template, landing page template, blog template and all system templates so it doesn’t sound like that would be the option to move forward with.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/resources/what-are-the-submission-requirements-for-the-template-marketplace#4-theme-requirements>
So if i want to create a stand alone landing page I would have to create it with the old drag and drop interphase? How are the ones available now created
I heard the other day that HubSpot is going to stop accepting submissions to the older template based marketplace but I can’t recall when that date is.
So these landing pages options would be just parts of full themes

If you are on CMS Hub Enterprise, you could use serverless functions to accomplish this. We have an event registration app sample that we have here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/serverless-functions/event-registration-app>
